mapper.update:
update t_powder_info
powderNo = #{powderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
powderType = #{powderType,jdbcType=CHAR},
powderBrand = #{powderBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
powderSpec = #{powderSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
powderPrice = #{powderPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
addTimestamp = #{addTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
addUserKey = #{addUserKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updTimestamp = #{updTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updUserKey = #{updUserKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updPgmId = #{updPgmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
freeDeliveryParameter = #{freeDeliveryParameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_powder_info set powderNo = #{powderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, powderType = #{powderType,jdbcType=CHAR}, powderBrand = #{powderBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, powderSpec = #{powderSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, powderPrice = #{powderPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, addTimestamp = #{addTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, addUserKey = #{addUserKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updTimestamp = #{updTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updUserKey = #{updUserKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updPgmId = #{updPgmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, freeDeliveryParameter = #{freeDeliveryParameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.powderNo, a.powderType, a.powderBrand, b.brandName as powderBrandName, a.powderSpec, a.powderPrice, a.weight, a.freeDeliveryParameter, a.remarks, a.status, a.addTimestamp, a.addUserKey, a.updTimestamp, a.updUserKey, a.updPgmId from t_powder_info a inner join t_brand_info b on a.powderBrand = b.id where a.status = '1' order by a.powderBrand,a.powderSpec
